name: Ihza Maulana Zakiya

about_us: I am a fresh graduate of Applied Bachelor of Information Technology from Politeknik Harapan Bersama, with a deep interest in software development, especially in the frontend area. I have a strong interest in JavaScript such as Vue.js and React.js. With a high passion for learning, I always strive to expand my knowledge and keep up with the latest trends in technology. I highly value teamwork and believe that collaboration is the key to come up with innovative solutions. I am ready to take on new challenges and contribute positively in the development team.
